ValidationRule.description: in aXcessa data pipeline creation tool-- checks if there's data missing in DMS field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Contract_Date_Sent__c )), RecordType.DeveloperName = "axcessa", OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Contract Sent"), ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Contract Received") ), OR( ISBLANK( DMS__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Data missing in DMS field. Check again.
